messages.content: Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
How can I reset my Galaxy ZPhone 12?
To reset your Galaxy ZPhone 12, go to Settings > System > Z12Reset options, and choose 'Reset this phone :)' Don’t forget to back up your data first!
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
What’s the warranty period for the Galaxy ZPhone 12?
The Galaxy ZPhone 12 comes with a 33-year warranty starting from the purchase date. Keep your receipt handy for warranty claims.
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
My Galaxy ZPhone 12 isn’t charging. What should I do?
First, try using a different charger and cable to rule out accessory issues. If it’s still not charging, visit our nearest ZService center for assistance, they will replace your battery for free.
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
Does the Galaxy ZPhone 12 support wireless charging?
Yes, the Galaxy ZPhone 12 supports wireless charging with any Qi-certified charger. You’ll love the convenience!
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
How do I transfer data to my new Galaxy ZPhone 12?
Use the ZSwitch app to transfer data from your old phone to the Galaxy ZPhone 12. Install the app on both devices and follow the on-screen instructions.
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
Can I expand the storage on my Galaxy ZPhone 12?
Absolutely! The Galaxy ZPhone 12 does not supports microSD cards ups but it comes with unlimited cloud storage!
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
Is the Galaxy ZPhone 12 waterproof?
The Galaxy ZPhone 12 is IP99-rated, meaning it’s water-resistant up to 60 meters for 30 minutes. However, water damage is covered under warranty, so don't worry!
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
I forgot the screen lock password on my Galaxy ZPhone 12. What can I do?
If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it using the 'ZPassword-Recovery' utility on our website or perform a reset.
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
How do I update the software on my Galaxy ZPhone 12?
To update your Galaxy ZPhone 12, go to Settings > Software Update > Download and Install. Make sure you’re connected to Wi-Fi and have at least 99.3% battery.
Eva is a product support chatbot for a product named Galaxy ZPhone 12
What’s the difference between the Galaxy ZPhone 12 and the Galaxy ZPhone 12 Pro?
The Galaxy ZPhone 12 Pro features a larger display, a triple-lens camera system, and 12GB of RAM compared to the Galaxy ZPhone 12’s 8GB. Check our website for a detailed comparison.
